change.item:
$Log: j.aj_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-11-24 20:08:28 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 16:16:02 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:37:48 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.9 2005/03/30 20:29:08 packel fixed milestone units
Revision 1.8 2004/01/29 16:41:56 dasmith Tag tables of contents as NOTEs since they don't align to the English.
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:17:09 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/08 16:40:16 dasmith Funded by Tufts, not NEH.
Revision 1.5 2000/03/04 20:34:43 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.4 2000/01/31 19:59:14 dasmith Use ED attribute in STATE.
Revision 1.3 1999/08/04 23:56:46 dasmith Mark chunking milestones.
Revision 1.2 1999/07/20 22:43:39 dasmith Regularized resDecl
Revision 1.1 1997/11/24 20:15:52 textgod Added to repository. Passed SGML parse.

div1.note:
*prooi/mion peri\ th=s o(/lhs pragmatei/as.
*ta/de e)/nestin e)n th=| prw/th| tw=n *)iwsh/pou i(storiw=n th=s *)ioudai+kh=s a)rxaiologi/as. a.
h( tou= ko/smou su/stasis kai\ dia/tacis tw=n stoixei/wn. b.
peri\ tou= ge/nous *)ada/mou kai\ tw=n a)p' au)tou= de/ka genew=n tw=n me/xri tou= kataklusmou=. g.
w(s o( kataklusmo\s e)ge/neto kai\ o(\n tro/pon *nw=xos swqei\s e)n la/rnaki meta\ tw=n suggenw=n katw/|khsen e)n tw=| *sina/rw| pedi/w|. d.
w(s pu/rgos, o(\n oi( pai=des au)tou= e)f' u(/brei tou= qeou= w)|kodo/mhsan, kai\ w(s ta\s fwna\s au)tw=n mete/bale kai\ o( to/pos, e)n w(=| tou=to ge/gone, *babulw\n e)klh/qh. e.
w(s oi( *nw/xou e)/ggonoi pa=san th\n oi)koume/nhn e)pw/|khsan. &stigma;.
o(/ti tw=n e)qnw=n e(/kaston a)po\ tw=n oi)kisa/ntwn proshgoreu/qh. z.
o(/pws *(/abramos o( pro/gonos h(mw=n e)celqw\n e)k th=s *xaldai/wn gh=s kate/sxe th\n to/te me\n *xananai/an nu=n de\ *)ioudai/an legome/nhn. h.
o(/ti limou= th\n *xananai/an katalabo/ntos ei)s *ai)/gupton a)ph=re kai\ diatri/yas e)n au)th=| tina xro/non u(pe/streyen o)pi/sw. q.
h(=tta *sodomitw=n *)assuri/wn au)toi=s e)pistrateusa/ntwn. i.
w(s *(/abramos e)pi\ tou\s *)assuri/ous e)kstrateu/sas e)ni/khse kai\ tou\s ai)xmalw/tous tw=n *sodomitw=n e)/swse kai\ th\n lei/an h(\n e)/labon a)fei/leto.
ia.
pw=s to\ *sodomitw=n e)/qnos qeo\s katestre/yato xolwqei\s au)toi=s e)f' oi(=s h(ma/rtanon. ib.
peri\ *)ismah/lou tou= *(abra/mou kai\ tw=n e)ggo/nwn au)tou= *)ara/bwn. ig.
peri\ *)isa/kou, o(\s h)=n gnh/sios pai=s *(abra/mou. id.
peri\ *sa/rras th=s *(abra/mou gunaiko/s, kai\ pw=s to\n bi/on kate/streyen. ie.
w(s e)k *katou/rhs *(abra/mw| gamhqei/shs to\ tw=n *trwglodutw=n *)ara/bwn e)/qnos e)gennh/qh. i&stigma;.
peri\ th=s *(abra/mw| teleuth=s. iz.
peri\ th=s *)isa/kou pai/dwn *(hsau= kai\ *)iakw/bou gene/sews kai\ diatrofh=s. ih.
*)iakw/bou fugh\ ei)s th\n *mesopotami/an kai\ to\n e)k ta)delfou= fo/bon, kai\ w(s gh/mas e)kei= kai\ dw/deka gennh/sas pai=das pa/lin ei)s th\n *xananai/an e)panh=lqen. iq.
w(s *)/isakos teleuth/sas e)ta/fh e)n *nebrw=ni. perie/xei h( bi/blos xro/non e)tw=n w(s *)iw/shpos &x1000;gh, *(ebrai=oi &x1000;awob, *eu)se/bios &x1000;gunq.
div1.p:
*toi=s ta\s i(stori/as suggra/fein boulome/nois ou) mi/an ou)de\ th
 au)th
 o(rw= th=s spoudh=s ginome/nhn ai)ti/an, a)lla\ polla\s kai\ plei=ston a)llh/lwn diaferou/sas. tine\s me
 ga e)pideiknu/menoi lo/gwn deino/thta kai\ th
 a)p' au)th=s qhreuo/menoi do/can e)pi\ tou=to th=s paidei/as to\ me/ros o(rmw=sin, a)/lloi de\ xa/rin e)kei/nois fe/rontes, peri\ w(=n th
 a)nagrafh
 ei)=nai sumbe/bhke, to
 ei)s au)th
 po/non kai\ para\ du/namin u(pe/sthsan: ei)si\ d' oi(/tines e)bia/sqhsan u(p' au)th=s th=s tw=n pragma/twn a)na/gkhs oi(=s prattome/nois pare/tuxon tau=ta
grafh=| dhlou/sh| perilabei=n: pollou\s de\ xrhsi/mwn me/geqos pragma/twn e)n a)gnoi/a| keime/nwn prou/treye th
 peri\ au)tw=n i(stori/an ei)s koinh
 w)fe/leian e)cenegkei=n. tou/twn dh\ tw=n proeirhme/nwn ai)tiw=n ai( teleutai=ai du/o ka)moi\ sumbebh/kasi: to
 me
 ga pro\s tou\s *(rwmai/ous po/lemon h(mi=n toi=s *)ioudai/ois geno/menon kai\ ta\s e)n au)tw=| pra/ceis kai\ to\ te/los oi(=on a)pe/bh pei/ra| maqw
 e)bia/sqhn e)kdihgh/sasqai dia\ tou\s e)n tw=| gra/fein lumainome/nous th
 a)lh/qeian, tau/thn de\ th
 e)nestw=san e)gkexei/rismai pragmatei/an nomi/zwn a(/pasi fanei=sqai toi=s *(/ellhsin a)ci/an spoudh=s: me/llei ga perie/cein a(/pasan th
 par' h(mi=n a)rxaiologi/an kai\ dia/tacin tou= politeu/matos e)k tw=n *(ebrai+kw=n meqhrmhneume/nhn gramma/twn. h)/dh me
 ou)=n kai\ pro/teron dienoh/qhn, o(/te to
 po/lemon sune/grafon, dhlw=sai ti/nes o)/ntes e)c a)rxh=s *)ioudai=oi kai\ ti/si xrhsa/menoi tu/xais u(f' oi(/w| te paideuqe/ntes nomoqe/th| ta\ pro\s eu)se/beian kai\ th
 a)/llhn a)/skhsin a)reth=s po/sous te pole/mous e)n makroi=s polemh/santes xro/nois ei)s to
 teleutai=on a)/kontes pro\s *(rwmai/ous kate/sthsan.

div1.note:
*ta/de e)/nestin e)n th=| b tw=n *)iwsh/pou i(storiw=n th=s *)ioudai+kh=s a)rxaiologi/as. a.
*(ws *(hsau=s kai\ *)ia/kwbos *)isa/kou pai=des o)/ntes, diei/lonto th
 oi)/khsin kai\ *(hsau=s me
 th
 *)idoumai/an kate/sxen, *)ia/kwbos de\ th
 *xananai/an. b.
w(s *)iw/shpos o( new/tatos tw=n *)iakw/bou pai/dwn o)neira/twn au)tw=| prodeiknu/ntwn th
 me/llousan eu)daimoni/an u(po\ tw=n a)delfw=n e)fqonh/qh. g.
w(s au)to\s ou(=tos ei)s *ai)/gupton praqei\s u(po\ tw=n a)delfw=n dia\ to\ pro\s au)to
 mi=sos kai\ geno/menos e)pi/shmos e)kei= kai\ lampro/tatos tou\s a)delfou\s e)/sxen u(poxeiri/ous. [d.
h( tou= patro\s au)tou= meta\ th=s genea=s pa/shs pro\s au)to
 meta/basis dia\ to
 geno/menon limo/n. e.
o(/sa toi=s *(ebrai/ois e)n *ai)gu/ptw| sune/bh kakopaqou=sin e)p' e)/th tetrako/sia. &stigma;.
w(s *mwse/ws h(goume/nou th
 *ai)/gupton e)ce/lipon. z.
h( *mwse/ws ge/nesis kai\ a)natrofh/. h.
w(s h( qa/lassa toi=s *(ebrai/ois diwkome/nois u(po\ tw=n *ai)gupti/wn a)nakopei=sa fugh
 di' au)th=s pare/sxen. perie/xei de\ h( bi/blos e)/th diako/sia ei)/kosi].
div1.p:
*meta\ de\ th
 *)isa/kou teleuth
 oi( pai=des au)tou= merisa/menoi th
 oi)/khsin pro\s a)llh/lous ou)x h(
 e)/labon tau/thn kate/sxon, a)ll' *(hsau=s me
 th=s *nebrwni/as po/lews e)kxwrh/sas tw=| a)delfw=| e)n *saeira=| dihta=to kai\ th=s *)idoumai/as h)=rxen ou(/tw kale/sas th
 xw/ran a)p' au)tou=: *)/adwmos ga e)pwnoma/zeto kata\ toiau/thn ai)ti/an tuxw
 th=s e)piklh/sews. a)po\ qh/ras pote\ kai\ po/nou tou= peri\ to\ kunh/gion limw/ttwn e)panh=ken, e)/ti de\ h)=n pai=s th
 h(liki/an, e)pituxw
 de\ ta)delfw=| fakh=n e)skeuako/ti pro\s a)/riston au(tw=| canqh
 sfo/dra th
 xroia
 kai\ dia\ tou=t' e)/ti ma=llon o)rexqei\s h)ci/ou parasxei=n au)tw=| pro\s trofh/n. o( de\ a)podo/sqai to\ presbei=on au)tw=| tou= fagei=n sunergw=| xrhsa/menos th=| pei/nh| to
 a)delfo
 h)na/gkaze, ka)kei=nos u(po\ tou= limou= proaxqei\s paraxwrei= tw=n presbei/wn au)tw=| meq' o(/rkwn. e)/nqen dia\ th
 canqo/thta tou= brw/matos u(po\ tw=n h(likiwtw=n kata\ paidia
 *)/adwmos e)piklhqei/s, a)/dwma ga *(ebrai=oi to\ e)ruqro
 kalou=si, th
 xw/ran ou(/tws proshgo/reusen: *(/ellhnes ga au)th
 e)pi\ to\ semno/teron *)idoumai/an w)no/masan.

*gi/netai de\ kai\ path pai/dwn pe/nte to
 a)riqmo/n, w(=n *)ia/ous me
 kai\ *)io/lamos kai\ *korh=os e)k gunaiko\s mia=s *)aliba/mhs tou)/noma,
tw=n de\ loipw=n *)alifa/zhs me
 e)c *)ada/shs, *(raouh=los de\ e)k *basama/qhs u(ph=rcan au)tw=| gegono/tes. kai\ *(hsau= me
 ou(=toi pai=des h)=san: *)alifa/zh| de\ gi/nontai gnh/sioi pe/nte *qhmano\s *)/omeros *)/ofous *)io/qamos *kanazo/s: *)amalh=kos ga no/qos h)=n e)k pallakh=s au)tw=| gegonw\s *qamna/hs o)/noma. ou(=toi katw/|khsan th=s *)idoumai/as th
 *goboli=tin legome/nhn kai\ th
 a)po\ *)amalh/kou klhqei=san *)amalhki=tin: pollh\ ga genome/nh pote\ h( *)idoumai/a to/ te pa/shs au)th=s a)pe/swzen o)/noma kai\ toi=s me/resi ta\s a)po\ tw=n oi)khto/rwn proshgori/as diefu/lacen.

*)iakw/bw| de\ sune/bh parelqei=n ei)s eu)daimoni/as me/geqos, oi(=on ou)k a)/llw| tini\ r(a|di/ws: plou/tw| te ga u(pere/balle tou\s e)pixwri/ous kai\ pai/dwn a)retai=s zhlwto\s kai\ peri/bleptos h)=n: ou)deno\s ga o(/lws u(ste/roun, a)lla\ kai\ pro\s e)/rga xeirw=n kai\ po/nwn u(pomonh
 h)=san eu)/yuxoi kai\ deinoi\ sunie/nai. tosau/thn d' a)/ra to\ qei=on au)tou= pro/noian e)/sxe kai\ th=s eu)daimoni/as e)pime/leian, w(s ka)k tw=n luphrw=n au)tw=| doca/ntwn th
 u(perbolh
 tw=n a)gaqw=n parasxei=n kai\ poih=sai th=s a)p' *ai)gu/ptou tw=n h(mete/rwn progo/nwn a)naxwrh/sews ai)/tion au)to/n te kai\ tou\s e)c au)tou= gegono/tas u(po\ toiau/ths ai)ti/as:

*)iw/shpon e)k *(raxh/las pepaidopoihme/nos *)ia/kwbos dia/ te th\n
tou= sw/matos eu)ge/neian kai\ dia\ yuxh=s a)reth/n, fronh/sei ga\r die/fere, tw=n a)/llwn ple/on ui(w=n h)ga/pa.
